name: Alibaba Cloud data disk is configured with release disk with instance feature
description:
This policy identifies data disks which are configured with release disk with instance feature. As a best practice, disable release disk with instance feature to prevent irreversible data loss from accidental or malicious operations.
Note: This attribute applies to data disks only. However, it can only restrict the manual release operation, not the release operation by Alibaba Cloud.
searchModel.query: config from cloud.resource where cloud.type = 'alibaba_cloud' AND api.name = 'alibaba-cloud-ecs-disk' AND json.rule = 'type equals data and deleteWithInstance is true'
recommendation:
1. Log in to Alibaba Cloud Portal
2. Go to Elastic Compute Service
3. In the left-side navigation pane, click on 'Disks' which is under 'Storage & Snapshots'
4. Select the reported data disk
5. Select More and click on Modify Disk Property
6. On Modify Disk Property popup window, Uncheck 'Release Disk with Instance' checkbox
7. Click on 'OK'
